website_summaries.verdict: A chic daybed that exudes sophistication and class. A great choice for anyone trying to achieve a soft and sleek contemporary look.
pros: Backless design is elegant and stylish, and opens up a world of placement options: under a window, as a room divider, or against a wall

Quality construction that goes together quickly and easily
cons: Trundle requires a thinner mattress to close properly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, looks great 2 yrs later...
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble. Parts are clearly marked and it went together in an hour. I suggest using a screw gun. When assembling the trundle mattress bars - place the plastic ends and mid piece, place over holes, insert open end first then middle and side against front board. The side board helps with inserting the plastic end into holes without any issues. Do not remove plastic from holes or they will break. Two years it has been used in a guest room and still looks great! I would buy another one.
